id.description:
AKA "The Children of the Forgiving God" or "The Followers of the Iron God of Eternal Mercy".
Adherents dress in loose purple and white robes, with metal pentagons on necklaces.

aspects.aspect: New Foreign Religion from the West
Slowly Making Inroads From the Bottom Up
We Scrupulously Keep Our Noses Clean

character.notes:
"Xarrat" is the Azerbaijani word for "carpenter".
Culty Goodness: Blood of the Masters (T:BS&J, pg 170) The **Shining Vampire Sect** kidnaps several masters in order to drink their blood and steal their power
Probably more interesting of the Children of Xarrat aid the PCs against the Shining Vampire Sect.
I should probably make a reverend of some sort.
Cf. Evil Cultists (T:BS&J, pg 156)
